channel.title: CVE Feed for ONLYOFFICE -- Workspace

item.title: CVE-2022-47412|2024-08-03T14:55:08.188Z -- onlyoffice -- workspace
item.description: Given a malicious document provided by an attacker, the ONLYOFFICE Workspace DMS is vulnerable to a stored (persistent, or "Type II") cross-site scripting (XSS) condition.
